tachyon.worker.nio

Class NIODataServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.nio.NIODataServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Runnable, DataServer

    public final class NIODataServer
extends Object
implements Runnable, DataServer
    The Server to serve data file read requests from remote machines. The current implementation is based on non-blocking NIO.
